meanings: (글·글씨 등을) write, (시·편지 등을) compose, (적다) put[write] (sth) down, (간단히) jot sth down

meanings.meaning: You can't take it with you.

vlive.korean: 약간 이렇게 인상 써야 되나? Should I frown like this? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [DREAMCATCHER] 울 강쥐 깜찍함에 머리박고 염라 만날까봐 무서워🐶💕 (YOOHYEON showing some facial expressions)
'클'인 거 알면 '버'를 써야 될 거 아냐! You should've written "Ver!" 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.6
피부가... 마스크를 좀 써야 하나? My skin... Should I wear the mask? 듣기 View video NCT : 오늘부터 (2월)1일💚 지성 뺅
vlive.english: My skin... Should I wear the mask?

vlive.korean: 써야 되겠다 - 됐다! - 답을 다 적으셨나요? I should write it. - Done! - Did you write all the answers? 듣기 View video OSEN : Stray KIds 스트레이키즈, 함께 여행가고 싶은 멤버 누구? #스타로드 10
vlive.english: I should write it. - Done! - Did you write all the answers?

vlive.korean: [광고주님들... 보고 계시죠...?] 남자는 BB만 써야 한다? [Are you watching this, brand managers...?] Men only use BB cream? 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 문예찬 얼굴보고 벽치다가 우리집 원룸 됨ㅋㅋ[리얼:타임:러브2] VLOG #발렌타인데이
vlive.english: [Are you watching this, brand managers...?] Men only use BB cream?

examples.korean: You should always pay attention to personal grooming. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 당신 자신의 개인적인 차림새에 항상 신경을 써야 한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: You should always pay attention to personal grooming. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Ministers should be more attentive to the needs of families. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 장관들은 가족들이 필요로 하는 것에 더 신경을 써야 한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Ministers should be more attentive to the needs of families. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: It is compulsory for all motorcyclists to wear helmets. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 오토바이를 타는 사람들은 모두 의무적으로[반드시] 헬멧을 써야 한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It is compulsory for all motorcyclists to wear helmets. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: To whom should I write? 듣기 Add to Wordbook 제가 누구에게 편지를 써야 하나요? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: To whom should I write? Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: You have to use the past tense. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 넌 과거 시제를 써야[사용해야] 해. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: You have to use the past tense. Add to Wordbook
